tool_description: An API that fetches games system requirements.
name: Spec It
title: Spec It

api_list.name: Game System Requirements
api_list.description: Shows minimum and recommended requirements of a game.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spec-it.p.rapidapi.com/batman-arkham-city"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spec-it.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://spec-it.p.rapidapi.com/{gameid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spec-it.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
